title: S16 Ep61: History of The Seance and Occult Beliefs of Spirit Communication
itunes:title: History of The Seance and Occult Beliefs of Spirit Communication
description:
Darkness Radio presents History of The Seance and Occult Beliefs of Spirit Communication with Dan & Kat Ekhart

Dave & Tim welcome, The Eckharts, seance hosts, mediums, and Celebrity Occultists obsessed with exploring what lies beyond the veil. Through their work, the Eckharts strive to share their love of the paranormal by showing that spirit communication can be exciting, mystical, and ultimately accessible to us all. 

Visit their site: www.TheEkharts.com

Get the book Occult America here: https://amzn.to/3fWgJ4i
